entry.data:
CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
